scripts.upload: aws s3 sync s3 s3://fennecs.tech --delete && aws s3 sync .vitepress/dist s3://fennecs.tech
scripts.invalidate: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1M9ZYXQGE1GG3 --paths "/*" && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E12V3ZFP8BEESL --paths "/*"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run upload && npm run invalidate
